Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Vinasa hai hareka vi'aga kasana vale ate nukasa kadhana vale la'i
Jisa ne ja'idada nu ikatha kita ate gina-gina ke rakhi'a
Uha socada hai ki usa di ja'idada hamesa usa de nala rahegi
Kade vi nahim, uha raundana vali jag'ha vica suti'a javega
Ate tusim ki jano ki uha raundana vali jag'ha ki hai
Uha unham la'i bada kara diti javegi
